product_name: Terry Sun Goddess Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: Discover the joy of riding in a contoured silhouette that gracefully curves with your body. The women's Terry Sun Goddess Bike Jersey offers a deep-cut racerback and UV and odor protection. 100% polyester fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly. Anti-odor finish and UPF 50+ sun protection. Front zipper offers 10 in. of ventilation for hot climbs. Terry Sun Goddess Bike Jersey features 2 open rear pockets and an athletic fit.
short_description: Discover the joy of riding in a contoured silhouette that gracefully curves with your body. The women's Terry Sun Goddess Bike Jersey offers a deep-cut racerback and UV and odor protection.
